name: Tank Battle Gauntlet
description:
This is my final project for my Scripting class! This page will be updated until the project is done.

You are the lone Green Tank. Wipe out the enemy tanks and retrieve the oil! Watch out, even though they're tanks they can be sneaky...

Move around with WASD and fire with Left Click

~~~UPDATE 1~~~

-added controller support!

-FINALLY learned to lock the cursor

-added lives and score
